com.px100systems.util.serialization

Interface ExternalWriter

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    DocumentWriter, PortableImpl.Writer

    public interface ExternalWriter
    External (Hazelcast Portable, etc.) writer. Guaranteed to never have nulls. Used internally by SerializationDefinition.
    Author:
    Alex Rogachevsky
